page.title: 13THATCHAM INDUSTRY, 1.
page.content: Thatcham has more than 15 factories. The largest industrial area is centred around Colthrop. Here are found Reeds Board Mills, they employ 500 people, cover 15 acres and make corrugated cases. Nearby are Fields who design and print cartons for Reeds. They employ 327 people and own 7.85 acres of land. Also in this area are Florco who store carpets, Atochem who employ 70 people, make plastic and chemicals and own 51,000 square feet, Sony who make Hi-Fis etc. employ 130 people and own 14 acres of land and Sphinx who employ 47 people and make tiles. Smaller factories are to be found in Station Road. These include Infast who employ 11 people and distribute fasteners and ADO who make lace products and employ several people.
